protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Recognizes the core sequence 5'-TAAACA-3'. Binds to NFAT-like motifs (purine-rich) in the IL2 promoter. Also binds to HIV-1 long terminal repeat. May be involved in both positive and negative regulation of important viral and cellular promoter elements

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
